title: Perform AML Check on New Client
description: As part of onboarding, a new client must be checked against AML and sanctions watchlists.

tasks.description: Take the new client's name and date of birth.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the client's identifying information.

tasks.description: Run the client's details through the AML screening tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully runs the check against global watchlists.

tasks.description: Review the results for any potential matches and clear any false positives.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the results, finds no true matches, and marks the check as complete.
